articles.title: Clashes In JNU, BJP-Linked Group Say Students Beaten Over Scholarship
articles.description: Half a dozen students have reportedly been injured during clashes between members of the student organisation Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad, or ABVP, and the campus security guards.

Several students, displaying their injuries, claimed they were "targeted" by security guards.

articles.description: Manish Sisodia, charged by the CBI over allegations linked to the capital's now-overturned liquor policy, had said earlier in the day that the BJP had offered to "shut all cases" against him if he quit the AAP and crossed over.

Manish Sisodia said the BJP had tried to coerce him into taking down the AAP.
